mapper.select: select * from item order by created_date desc limit 20

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, t.tax_rate FROM item as it
INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE group_id = #{search.searchId} and name like '%${search.searchName}%'

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.tax_id, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, it.group_id, t.tax_rate FROM item as it INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE name like '%${search.searchName}%' ORDER BY it.item_id ASC

SELECT it.item_id, it.name, it.description, it.tax_id, it.price, it.price * (t.tax_rate / 100 + 1 ) as 'tax_on_price', it.status, it.url, it.group_id, t.tax_rate FROM item as it
INNER JOIN tax as t ON it.tax_id = t.tax_id WHERE it.item_id = ${id}
SELECT id, item_id, url FROM item_images WHERE item_id = ${id}
